item.title: Firefox Tricks
item.description:
Search from bookmarks only:

  • Press F6 i.e. goto search/url bar
  • Press *[_]search_text i.e. star space search_text

Search from open tabs only:

  • Press F6 i.e. goto search/url bar
  • Press % search_text i.e. star space search_text

Restart the firefox without losing current tabs or context:

  • Press Shift+f2, a shell at bottom of screen will show up.
  • Type restart

Find your profile folder location from firefox itself.

  • Press F6 i.e. goto search/url bar
  • Type about:support, will show all the details.
